column4: So I just install 12.04 - Could someone tell me what package to install to get the Gnome classic interface? I can't seem to find it.
the gnome classic interface is buggy you're probably better of getting http://mate-desktop.org
- Do you have any idea? I just want my menu bar back. I don't mind using the default desktop, I just want the usual listing of installed applications and system settings, etc
i dunno what you're talking about
